parameters: Hello. I'm Penelope. I sell excellent fruits, veggies,
and healthy drinks.

Wait. Don't have it? Listen, I don't like to turn away

you?

No thanks.
What do you need?
I need someone to take some food packages to the
food bank in the slums. Too many people are going
hungry and I want to help them. If you help I'll
pay you five dollars for each delivery. Deal?
Deal.

Thank you for your help.
Oh, and one more thing. Come back in just a sec. I
have something to ask you.
Delivered.
Great. Here's another package of food. Please
deliver it to Murrow at the Food Bank.
You were paid $5 for the delivery.
Did you know that Apples are very healthy?
Well they are. And my shipment of Apples is missing.
I hear there is trouble in Appletown. If you'll go
investigate it, I will pay you generously. Ok?
Ok. How do I get there?
Not now.
Ok. How do I get there?
You'll have to go back through the Slums and find the
door through the statues. The Slums were walled off
by the Patriarchs. But I know there is a key hidden
in the Slums somewhere. Look around for it.
Do you want a hint?
No
Do you want a hint?
Well, I see you have a Home Token. Use it and it
will take you to your home. The front door leads
to the Slums. Saves time, you know.
No
Well, good luck then.
Not now.
That's too bad.
You completed the apple quest.
I've heard stories about your heroic actions in
Applegate. Not only have you saved a town from
ruin, but you've reopened my apple supply. Good job.
You deserve an extra reward for that.
You received $1000
You've shown remarkable character and courage, and
I would like to offer you something more. How would
you like a steady job?
Tell me more.
I'll have to think it over.
Not at this time.
Tell me more.
I thought you might be a great sales rep. You can
travel and manage my supply chain. I'll give you a
commmission on the business you complete.
You will deliver my shipments and also return with
goods you've purchased for sale here in this shop.
Interested?
Yes. It sounds great.
Not right now.
Yes. It sounds great.
Good. You'll start today. Return to Applegate first
and deliver a shipment of Oranges. Pick up more
Apples and return here. Get the best price for the
Oranges and try to get a better price for the Apples.
Ok.
Ok.
Here's an extra $50 for expenses. The cost of Apples
comes out of this fund, but you keep 10% of the
sale price of the Oranges.
Not right now.
It's a good offer. Think about it.
I'll have to think it over.
It's a good offer. Think about it.
Not at this time.

Here's your reward Well done.

Have you completed a delivery and pickup?
Comment : <Mini Label: MARKET>
No entry.
One of those party goers has an expensive diamond.
I have it on good authority that they stole it.
What to you say, you steal it from them. I'll pay
you $20.
I'll look around.
Not interested.
I'll look around.
Good. It's that dame down near the stairway. Get her
talkin' and the nick the jewel. Easy.
This is bad.
Not interested.
Diamonds are worth a lot.
I was gonna share the profits 80/20.
80 for me, right?
Sure, why not?
80 for me, right?
What? You're askin' me to cut me own throat.
Get lost.
Sure, why not?
Show me what you got, bud.
This is bad.
Well done. Well done indeed. It'll be morning before
she realizes it's gone. Well, I'm no welcher. Here's
your cut.
He gives you a wrinkled $100 bill.
It's gotta be worth more than that.
Wow. How generous.
It's gotta be worth more than that.
Stolen goods, you know. Never can get full price.
A
Wow. How generous.
Take what you can get, I always say. And that's what
you get. So scram.
A
Maybe you should find another line of work.
A
Exiter is up at the top of the room.
Penelope is to the right.
They might have jobs for you.
Why you look downright lost, hon. What can I do to
cheer you up?
Give us a kiss.
Tell me about yourself.
That guy over there told me to steal your diamond.
Give us a kiss.
Why aren't you forward. I don't see how a little peck
can hurt. Can't have you going around all sad and
lonely can we?
She leans over to kiss you and you pull her close.
This is maybe a little more than I...
You kiss her an she stops talking.
While she is distracted, you unclasp her necklace
with one hand and drop it in your pocket.
A
Tell me about yourself.
Why how flattering. My daddy was the Mayor, you know,
and I grew up in society. You can tell the breeding
of someone who grew up...
As she chatters on, you realize that you won't be
able to get the diamond. You find an excuse to leave,
and as you walk away, she's still talking.
I can't take any more of this.
A
That guy over there told me to steal your diamond.
Why, how deplorable. You are a very honest person.
I admire that. I don't know quite what to do, but
you've earned a handsome reward.
She hands you a crisp $100 bill.
You thank her and leave.
I'm the good witch.
A
I think you're ready for some real work. Want to earn
some money? Whaddya say?
What do I have to do?
Sure. Sign me up?
What do I have to do?
You'll just deliver a few packages, just like you did
for Lady Rose.
What's in the packages?
How much does it pay?
What's in the packages?
Nothing to concern you, friend. Just keep your nose
clean and your mouth shut,
and you'll be amply rewarded.
Sounds good to me.
No thanks. I think I'll look around.
Sounds good to me.
Ok. Talk to the chump over there. He'll give you
the packages and instructions. You have a future,
friend. Just stick with me.
This is bad.
No thanks. I think I'll look around.
Your loss.
I'm the good witch.
How much does it pay?
Good question. For each package you deliver I'll pay
you ten dollars.
If you do well, you might get a raise.
Sounds good to me.
No thanks. I think I'll look around.
Sounds good to me.
Ok. Talk to the chump over there. He'll give you
the packages and instructions. You have a future,
friend. Just stick with me.
No thanks. I think I'll look around.
Your loss.
I'm the good witch.
Sure. Sign me up?
I like someone who doesn't ask too many questions.
I means he won't give any answers... to the wrong
people. You're on.
Talk to the chump over there. He'll give you the
packages and instructions. Come back to me to get
paid. You've got a future, even if you don't know it.
This is bad.
You need some seasoning, friend. I'm looking for
someone with a certain, shall we call it moral
flexibility? Come back when you'velearned a thing
or three.
Ugh. Chump just told me that you're out working for
that Do-gooder Penelope. What a loser.
No deal. You just don't cut it.
I might have some more work for you.
I can't give you another package until you deliver
the first one. Now get on with it.
Fresh out of packages. that was the last one.
I guess you'll have to find another job, bud.
The Chump paid you $10.
What happened to the package? You open it?
Yes
No
The cop took it
Yes
You lose another like that and you're done.
Get it? One more chance.
You got another package.
That's it. You're done.
No
You had your chances, chum.
That's it. You're done.
Keep your nose clean and don't lose any more
packages. Right? Here's a replacement.
You got another package to deliver.
The cop took it
That's two strikes. One for losing the package
and two for lying to me. You think I don't know
what goes on around here? Two strikes. You're done.
Oh yeah? You gotta be smart. Stay away from the cops.
Got it? I'll cut you some slack this time.
You got another package to deliver.
Good. You delivered the package. Here's another.
The Chump paid you $10.
I've got a package for you. Deliver it to Serge
in the Junk Yard.
I'll unlock the gate for you.
Zzzzzz. Why wake me up?
